headline: Akamai Technologies Announces Acquisition of Function-as-a-Service Company Fermyon
summary: Extends Akamai Cloud with a programmable platform that simplifies the deployment of AI and other functions at the edgeCAMBRIDGE, Mass., Dec. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today announced that it has acquired Fermyon the serverless WebAssembly company.
